org.zodiark.service.session

Interface StreamingSessionService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StreamingSessionServiceImpl

    public interface StreamingSessionService
extends Service
    The Service responsible for creating and manipulating streaming session workflow.
